items.content_html: ValGuard ‚Äî‚Äî is a powerful yet lightweight profanity filter API designed to help developers easily integrate content moderation capabilities into their web applications. With ValGuard, you can efficiently detect and filter out toxic language, ensuring a cleaner and safer user experience for your platform.

items.content_html: KaliPHP is a fast, lightweight PHP framework. In an age where frameworks are a dime a dozen, We believe that KaliPHP will stand out in the crowd. It will do this by combining all the things you love about the great frameworks out there, while getting rid of the bad.
